body:
As some as you may know Battle of eternity is going on and it is being streamed on twitch. I noticed there were no past broadcast so I couldn't see what was going on and who was winning or losing the matches because my team was playing and I missed the stream. I just think past broadcasts could be a better step forward.


tell me me what you think down below
